short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Typography Inspector analyses the typography on your site and helps you improve it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Typography Inspector to show how close your line width and line height are to the recommended setting for an average paragraph. It can also show you the typographic color of your text elements.
